help_message:
How to use:

â„¹ï¸ Quick guide:
â€¢ â˜ï¸  City Weather â€” tap and enter a city name
â€¢ ğŸ   Home Weather â€” show weather for your saved home (if set)
â€¢ â•  Set Home â€” save your home by city name
â€¢ ğŸ—‘  Remove Home â€” delete your saved home

ğŸ“Œ Commands:
â€¢ /sethome <city> â€” set your home location
â€¢ /subscribe HH[:MM] â€” enable daily weather for your home
â€¢ /unsubscribe â€” disable subscription
â€¢ /privacy â€” privacy policy
â€¢ /data â€” what data is stored
â€¢ /delete_me â€” delete all your data
â€¢ /cancel â€” cancel input
